channel.title: Compose on Sid Patil - Android Engineer and Kotlin Advocate
channel.description: Recent content in Compose on Sid Patil - Android Engineer and Kotlin Advocate

item.title: Build Function Chains Using Composition in Kotlin
item.description: We are going to focus on how we can use functions to alter the nature of an object and change it, and how we can chain functions together to apply their effects on an object in one go with a composite pattern.

item.title: Holi: A library of colors, gradients and utils for Jetpack Compose
item.description: A library of colors, gradients and utils built using Jetpack Compose for Android Features A wide collection of colors from different palettes for easy access in your pet projects Provides easy gradient building functions that all your composable brushes need Just 28 KB in size!
